name: content_ingestion
description: Allows the agent to read and ingest content from various sources: local files, text input, or URLs.

source_type.description: The type of content source to ingest.

source_path.description: The file path or URL to ingest. Leave empty if source_type is 'text'.

content.description: Direct text content to ingest. Only used when source_type is 'text'.

metadata.description: Optional metadata about the content (author, date, title, etc.).
